name: Doduo
description: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1.  If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is confused, it has twice its evasion.
abilities.description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.
